summary: This rearranges blacksmith exteriors to add smelters in Falkreath, Riften, Riverwood and Solitude.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#6fa8dc][size=4]Nexus re-release. Formerly only available from Steam Workshop and TES Alliance.[/size][/color]

[color=#e69138][size=3]In most of Southern Skyrim there is no one to smelt your ore or melt your metals. Even the great Imperial city of Solitude lacks this modern and simple service. This will seamlessly make it as if they were there all along. It offers:[/size]

[/color][list][*][size=3][color=#e69138]Custom smelters, some shelving and a restocking coal barrel.[/color][/size][/*]
[*][size=3][color=#e69138]Convenience for those who love to adventure and live in the South. [/color][/size][/*]
[*][size=3][color=#e69138]Redesigned smithy porches in Falkreath, Riften, Riverwood and Solitude. [/color][/size][/*]
[*][size=3][color=#e69138]Compatibility with mods that don't alter forges or blacksmith lights in those cities. [/color][/size][/*]
[*][size=3][color=#e69138]Tes5Edit cleanliness and re-naved flooring. No immersion breaking clipping.[/color][/size][/*]
[/list][color=#e69138]
[/color][color=#e69138]
[size=4]Maximum compatibility: This alters the blacksmith porches only - [u]no building or exterior modifications[/u].[/size]
[/color]
author: Robinsage
